insert into t_transferee (id, time, invest_id, user_id, title, debt_amount, transfer_price, transfer_period, transfer_user_id, status, service_order_no, trust_order_no, debt_id, project_invest_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{investId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transferPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transferPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transferUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{serviceOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trustOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectInvestId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_transferee set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invest_id = #{investId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, debt_amount = #{debtAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transfer_price = #{transferPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transfer_period = #{transferPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transfer_user_id = #{transferUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, service_order_no = #{serviceOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trust_order_no = #{trustOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, debt_id = #{debtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_invest_id = #{projectInvestId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
